Posted: September 26, 2025

Pursuing place, not things

Thank you to the Exchange Cafe↗ and Rāngai↗ for collecting candidate thoughts on climate change↗ at the time of our council candidate videos.

 

I do bang on about place, not things, and that might sound disconcerting for local retailers... but I love local retail.

This latest, beautiful example is what I believe the future of retail+value-added service↗ looks like in a provincial resilient, sustainable, resourceful future place:

We can be the little resilient beacon of hope on the Coast.
